name: Dark Skies (Alpha)
description:
Blast ships away in an epic 2D space battle! Remake of Azul Baronis for you flash game lovers out there :)

I need to fix music not loading, but until then you can play your own music I guess lol

If you liked it, consider leaving a review or comment!

Instructions:

Use mouse to move and shoot (or press the middle mouse button to toggle to WASD movement),

Shift to boost/sprint

Q/E switches units,

M toggles the map,

comma (,) toggles the music, period (.) toggles the sound

Multiplayer was working, but servers cost money, and it needs a rework, so if it gets enough attention, maybe I'll get around to making it less laggy with more ships, and reworking multiplayer ;P
